oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: T. D. Patton corresondence with Chairman of City School Board, 1960 November 10
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Patton, T. D.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Letter from T. D. Patton of Carthage Tennessee to Raymond B. Witt, chairman of the Board of Education in Chattanooga, Tennessee, regarding public school integration. Patton encloses a doucment entitled, The Bible on Segregation.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Segregation in education -- Tennessee -- Chattanooga
Chattanooga Public Schools (Chattanooga, Tenn.); Chattanooga (Tenn.). Board of Education
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:source: Chattanooga Board of Education records and correspondence, 1953-1961
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:isPartOf: Raymond B. Witt Chattanooga Public Schools desegregation records
